title: Hearings Management
description: Schedule, track, and manage all court hearings and legal proceedings
overview: The Hearings module provides comprehensive management of court schedules, hearing preparation, and outcome tracking. It integrates with case management to ensure all hearing-related activities are properly documented and tracked.

keyFeatures.name: Hearing Scheduling
keyFeatures.description: Schedule new hearings with complete details including court, judge, and purpose
keyFeatures.benefit: Centralized hearing calendar with all relevant information

keyFeatures.name: Calendar Integration
keyFeatures.description: Sync hearings with external calendars and receive notifications
keyFeatures.benefit: Never miss a hearing date with automated reminders

keyFeatures.name: Preparation Tracking
keyFeatures.description: Track preparation status and required documents for each hearing
keyFeatures.benefit: Ensures thorough preparation and professional presentation

keyFeatures.name: Outcome Recording
keyFeatures.description: Record hearing results and next steps
keyFeatures.benefit: Complete case history and follow-up action tracking

philosophy.title: Punctual & Prepared
philosophy.description: Effective hearing management combines timely scheduling with thorough preparation
